CustomField.formula: IF( OR(Service_Country__c != '', NOT(ISPICKVAL(Service_Country_Lead__c, ''))), IMAGE(IF( OR(Service_Country__c = 'DE', ISPICKVAL(Service_Country_Lead__c, 'DE')), "/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/download/0681v00000olPKP", IF( OR(Service_Country__c = 'AT', ISPICKVAL(Service_Country_Lead__c,'AT')), "/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/download/0681v00000olPTD",'')), "Flags", 30, 55),'')
CustomField.label: Service Country Flag
